questions.question: Are all access control readers functioning properly, including card readers, keypads, or biometric scanners?
Are access control credentials (cards, fobs, PIN codes) being recognized and granting appropriate access?
Is there any evidence of unauthorized access or security breaches detected by the access control system?
Are access control system wiring and connections secure and free from damage or wear?
Is the access control system software up-to-date with the latest patches and security updates?
Are access control system logs reviewed regularly for any anomalies or suspicious activity?
Have access control system user permissions and access levels been reviewed and updated as needed?
Are there any issues with door locks or electronic strikes controlled by the access control system?
Is the access control system integrated with other security systems, such as video surveillance or intrusion detection?
Have any access control system alarms or alerts been investigated and resolved?
Are there any environmental factors, such as temperature or humidity, that could affect access control system components?
Have access control system manuals and documentation been kept up-to-date and readily available for reference?
Are there any regulatory compliance requirements or industry standards that need to be followed for access control system maintenance?
Have access control system components, such as readers and controllers, been tested for functionality?
Are there any physical obstructions or obstacles that could interfere with access control system operation?
Have access control system backup batteries been tested and replaced if necessary?
Are access control system user interfaces, such as software interfaces or mobile apps, functioning correctly?
Have access control system access points been inspected for signs of tampering or damage?
Are there any issues with access control system signal range or coverage?
Have any access control system components that are not working or malfunctioning been identified and scheduled for repair or replacement?
Have access control system users been provided with clear instructions on how to operate the system and report any issues?
Have any access control system service agreements or warranties been reviewed and updated as needed?
Are there any vulnerabilities or weaknesses in the access control system that need to be addressed through additional security measures or upgrades?
Have users been surveyed or consulted for feedback on the access control system's performance and usability, and have any issues raised been addressed appropriately?
Have any maintenance tasks, such as cleaning readers or testing backup power sources, been performed according to schedule?
